content: ककुदः --दं {@--1@} The peak or summit of a mountain. {@--2@} A hump (on the shoulders of an Indian bull). {@--3@} Chief, foremost, pre-eminent; ककुदं वेदविदां तपोधनश्च <ls>Mk. 1. 5</ls>; इक्ष्वाकुवंश्यः ककुदं नृपाणां <ls>R. 6. 71.</ls> {@--4@} A sign or symbol of royalty; नृपतिककुदं <ls>R. 3. 70</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 27.</ls> {@--5@} A species of serpent.
